video.title: A Word from Warm Heart
video.synopsis: Happy housewife Mi Kyung finds her world turned upside down when she learns that her husband is having an affair with another woman.

episodes.synopsis: As Eun Jin goes through her day, taking cooking classes and keeping up the façade of a perfect family, she is tormented by a powerful secret.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: When her already distant husband grows even colder, Mi-Kyung hires an investigator to follow him and discovers a shattering truth.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jae-Hak fears that someone is following Eun-Jin, but she refuses his help. Soon, he discovers someone pursuing him as well.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jae-Hak is enraged when Mi-Kyung reveals that she knew of his affair and refuses to believe that she didn't cause Eun-Jin's accident.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Sang-Soo hopes to start things over with Eun-Jin, who gives him one more chance to reconsider before deciding not to tell him about her affair.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Mi-Kyung comes to believe that her brother caused Eun-Jin's accident. When he confesses, he says he only did it to protect her.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Min-Soo steps in when Mi-Kyung's mother-in-law berates her for the fuss she's making over Jae-Hak's affair. Meanwhile, Eun Young falls for Min-Soo.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Sung-Soo begins to piece together a mystery when a man he hires to follow Eun-Jin turns out to be the same operative Jae-Hak paid to trail her.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Sung-Soo's rage at Eun-Jin brings the police, spreading news of the affair. When Eun-Jin's mother finds out, she lashes out at her daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Sung-Soo violently confronts Jae-Hak about the affair. Meanwhile, Mi-Kyung is emotionally torn by her anger at Jae-Hak and her role as a wife.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Sung-Soo asks Eun-Jin for a divorce but is angered when she seems to have expected it. Meanwhile, Mi-Kyung tells Jae-Hak she will try to forgive him.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Mi-Kyung finds a letter from Jae-Huk to Eun-Jin that makes her reconsider what she thought of the affair and of forgiving her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Mi-Kyung and Jae-Hak argue over a divorce. Meanwhile, Sung-Soo and Eun-Jin must pretend things are going well when his injured mother comes to stay.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: When Jae-Hak's mother is hospitalized, Mi-Kyung steps in to care for her, just as Eun-Jin is looking after Sung-Soo's injured mother at their home.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When Min-Soo and Eun-Young's families finally meet, everyone learns of their own connection to Jae-Hak's infidelity and the couple decide to break up.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Perplexed over Min-Soo's sudden decision to break up, Eun-Young turns to Mi-Kyung, who tells her to ask her sister, Eun-Jin, about it.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Min-Soo tells Eun-Jin he caused her accident, but she still hopes he'll get back with Eun-Young. Later, a drunken Eun-Young seeks Mi-Kyung's help.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Sung-Soo wants to start over with Eun-Jin, who's reluctant. Meanwhile, Eun-Young tries to reconcile with Min-Soo.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: As they divorce, Jae-Hak and Mi-Kyung "celebrate" their final days as a couple. Meanwhile, Eun-Jin and Sung-Soo try to start life anew.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: On the trip marking their last days together, Jae-Hak and Mi-Kyung start to fall in love again. Sung-Soo and Eun-Jin continue to reconcile.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: This look back at the series revisits favorite scenes and characters, and examines adultery and communication both on the show and in real life.
episodes.title: Episode 21
